text: Misoli korhoi kasone, ki ʙa Alloh kofir sudaand (ʙa monandi nekui va silai rahm), cun xokistarest, ki dar ruzi tufone ʙodi saxte ʙar on vazad. Tavonoii nigoh dostani on ciro, ki ʙa dast ovardaand, nadorand, zero kufr amalhojasonro ʙiraʙud, cunon ki samol xokistarro. In ast gumrohii duru daroz
